project_abstract.cdata: The project is part of Uganda's long-term beef cattle development program and provides for financing the development of five large ranches, each of 38,000 to 45,000 acres, to be operated by Uganda Livestock Industries (ULI) a subsidiary of the Uganda Development Corporation, one cooperatively-owned ranch of 38,000 acres, and about 50 existing privately operated ranches of about 3,000 acres each. Under the lending program financing would be made available for such investments as on-ranch roads, firebreaks, fencing, water supply, stock handling and animal health control facilities, ranch buildings, breeding stock and an initial procurement of feeder steers for fattening.
